remember to have each lang file in the specified folder (ui, regex, help)
default language:
settings.task_amount:
How many task at a day?
only digits
default amount:

When difficulty is not speccified, whitch will be the value?
only digits from 1 to 5
default value:
settings.search_results:
Max amount of serch results?
only digits
default amount:
settings.context:
Wich would be the context loaded on start?
default context:

Max characters for task?
only digits
default value:

Apply action without confirmation?
[y]es | [N]o
default behaviour:

default behaviour:
